name: Follow me
description:
Follow Me is an independent platformer with adventure and puzzle elements. The little white rabbit's curiosity about what lies behind the door ends up taking him on a long and engaging adventure.


The gameplay is based on the exploration of various lands and the interaction with the characters that you encounter, which may be friendly or hostile.
Our bunny, traveling through strange locations, helps the characters he meets, who also help in further adventure. He gains new skills and uncovers hidden secrets to reach the mysterious grand finale.
Beautiful graphics and gameplay refer to classic games from the era of 8-bit computers.



Follow the white rabbit.
